redeem_code.title: Redeem Code
redeem_code.paste_error: Cannot access clipboard, please paste manually
redeem_code.no_link: Admin has not set up the top-up link!

channel.title: Channel Management
channel.search: Search channels by ID, name and key...
channel.balance_notice: OpenAI channels no longer support getting balance via key, so balance shows as 0. For supported channel types, click balance to refresh.
channel.test_notice: Channel testing only supports chat models, preferring gpt-3.5-turbo. If unavailable, uses the first model in your configured list.
channel.detail_notice: Click the detail button below to show balance and set additional test models.

table.name: Name
table.priority_tip: Channel selection priority, higher is preferred

messages.test_success: Channel {{name}} test successful, model {{model}}, time {{time}}s, output: {{message}}
messages.test_all_started: Channel testing started successfully, please refresh page to see results.
messages.all_balance_updated: All enabled channel balances have been updated!

edit.name: Name
edit.group_placeholder: Please select groups that can use this channel
edit.group_addition: Please edit group multipliers in system settings to add new group:
edit.models_placeholder: Please select models supported by this channel
edit.model_mapping_placeholder: Optional, used to modify model names in request body. A JSON string where keys are request model names and values are target model names
edit.system_prompt_placeholder: Optional, used to force set system prompt. Use with custom model & model mapping. First create a unique custom model name above, then map it to a natively supported model
edit.proxy_url_placeholder: This is optional and used for API calls via a proxy. Please enter the proxy URL, formatted as: https://domain.com
edit.base_url_placeholder: The Base URL required by the OpenAPI SDK
edit.batch_placeholder: Please enter keys, one per line

messages.name_required: Please enter channel name and key!
messages.models_required: Please select at least one model!
messages.model_mapping_invalid: Model mapping must be valid JSON format!

edit.spark_version_placeholder: Please enter Spark model version from API URL, e.g.: v2.1
edit.knowledge_id_placeholder: Please enter knowledge base ID, e.g.: 123456
edit.plugin_param_placeholder: Please enter plugin parameter (X-DashScope-Plugin header value)
edit.coze_notice: For Coze, model name is the Bot ID. You can add prefix `bot-`, e.g.: `bot-123456`.
edit.douban_notice: For Douban, you need to go to
edit.douban_notice_2: to create an inference endpoint, and use the endpoint name as model name, e.g.: `ep-20240608051426-tkxvl`.
edit.vertex_credentials: Google Cloud Application Default Credentials JSON
edit.vertex_credentials_placeholder: Google Cloud Application Default Credentials JSON
edit.user_id_placeholder: User ID who generated this key

key_prompts.default: Please enter the authentication key for this channel

edit.name: Name
edit.models_placeholder: Please select allowed models, leave empty for no restrictions
edit.ip_limit_placeholder: Please enter allowed subnets, e.g.: 192.168.0.0/24, use commas to separate multiple subnets
edit.expire_time_placeholder: Please enter expiry time in yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format, -1 for no limit
edit.quota_notice: Note: Token quota only limits the maximum usage of the token itself, actual usage is subject to account remaining quota.

messages.create_success: Token created successfully, please copy it from the list page!

messages.copy_failed: Unable to copy to clipboard, please copy manually. Token has been filled in the search box.

redemption.title: Redemption Management
redemption.search: Search redemption codes by ID and name ...

edit.name: Name
edit.quota_placeholder: Please enter quota per redemption code
edit.count_placeholder: Please enter number of codes to generate

edit.title: Update User Information
edit.password_placeholder: Please enter new password, minimum 8 characters
edit.group_addition: Please edit group multipliers in system settings to add new group:
edit.github_id_placeholder: Read-only, user must link through personal settings page, cannot be modified directly
edit.wechat_id_placeholder: Read-only, user must link through personal settings page, cannot be modified directly
edit.email_placeholder: Read-only, user must link through personal settings page, cannot be modified directly

general.title: General Settings
general.system_token_notice: Note: The token generated here is for system management, not for requesting OpenAI related services.

wechat.title: WeChat Binding
wechat.description: Scan QR code to follow the official account, enter 'verification code' to get the code (valid for 3 minutes)

delete_account.title: Dangerous Operation
delete_account.warning: You are deleting your account. All data will be cleared and cannot be recovered
delete_account.confirm_placeholder: Enter your username {{username}} to confirm deletion

login.title: Login & Registration Settings
login.email_verification: Require Email Verification for Password Registration
login.registration: Allow New User Registration (When disabled, new users cannot register by any means)

email_restriction.title: Email Domain Whitelist
email_restriction.subtitle: Used to prevent malicious users from batch registering using temporary emails

smtp.title: SMTP Configuration
smtp.subtitle: Used to support system email sending
smtp.token_placeholder: Sensitive information will not be sent to frontend

github.title: GitHub OAuth App Configuration
github.subtitle: Used to support GitHub login and registration
github.manage_text: to manage your GitHub OAuth Apps
github.url_notice: Set Homepage URL to {{server_url}}, and Authorization callback URL to {{callback_url}}
github.client_id_placeholder: Enter your registered GitHub OAuth APP ID
github.client_secret_placeholder: Sensitive information will not be sent to frontend

lark.title: Lark OAuth Configuration
lark.subtitle: Used to support Lark login and registration
lark.url_notice: Set Homepage URL to {{server_url}}, and Redirect URL to {{callback_url}}
lark.client_secret_placeholder: Sensitive information will not be sent to frontend

wechat.title: WeChat Server Configuration
wechat.subtitle: Used to support WeChat login and registration
wechat.token_placeholder: Sensitive information will not be sent to frontend
wechat.qrcode: WeChat Official Account QR Code Image URL
wechat.scan_tip: Scan QR code to follow WeChat Official Account, enter 'code' to get verification code (valid for 3 minutes)

turnstile.title: Turnstile Configuration
turnstile.subtitle: Used to support user verification
turnstile.manage_text: to manage your Turnstile Sites, Invisible Widget Type recommended
turnstile.site_key_placeholder: Enter your registered Turnstile Site Key
turnstile.secret_key_placeholder: Sensitive information will not be sent to frontend

warning.title: Warning
warning.content: Disabling password login will prevent all users (including administrators) who haven't bound other login methods from logging in via password. Confirm disable?

quota.title: Quota Settings
quota.pre_consume_placeholder: Refund or charge difference after request
quota.invitee_reward: Reward Quota for Using Invite Code

model.title: Model Ratio
model.placeholder: A JSON text where keys are model names and values are ratios

completion.title: Completion Ratio
completion.placeholder: A JSON text where keys are model names and values are ratios. These ratios are the proportion of completion to prompt ratio, which can override One API's internal ratios

group.title: Group Ratio
group.placeholder: A JSON text where keys are group names and values are ratios

monitor.title: Monitor Settings
monitor.max_response_time_placeholder: In seconds, channels exceeding this time during testing will be automatically disabled
monitor.quota_reminder_placeholder: Users will receive email reminders when quota falls below this value

general.title: General Settings
general.topup_link_placeholder: e.g.: Card selling website purchase link
general.chat_link_placeholder: e.g.: ChatGPT Next Web deployment address
general.quota_per_unit_placeholder: Quota exchangeable per unit of currency
general.retry_times_placeholder: Number of retry attempts on failure
general.display_token_stat: Show Token Quota Instead of User Quota in Billing APIs
general.approximate_token: Use Approximate Method to Estimate Token Count

notice.title: Notice Settings
notice.content_placeholder: Enter new notice content here, supports Markdown & HTML code

homepage.title: Homepage Content
homepage.placeholder: Enter homepage content here, supports Markdown & HTML code. Status information will not be shown after setting. If a link is entered, it will be used as the src attribute of an iframe, allowing you to set any webpage as homepage.

about.title: About System
about.description: You can set about content in settings page, supports HTML & Markdown

footer.title: Footer
footer.placeholder: Enter new footer here, leave empty to use default footer, supports HTML code

copyright.notice: Removing One API's copyright notice requires authorization. Project maintenance requires significant effort, if this project is meaningful to you, please actively support it.

footer.license: , source code is licensed under the

welcome.title: Welcome to One API
welcome.description: One API is a LLM API management and distribution system that helps you better manage and use LLM APIs from various providers.
welcome.login_notice: To use the service, please login or register first.

wechat.scan_tip: Scan QR code to follow WeChat Official Account, enter 'code' to get verification code (valid for 3 minutes)

reset.title: Password Reset
reset.notice: The system will send an email containing a reset link to your mailbox. Please check your email.

confirm.title: Password Reset Confirmation
confirm.notice: New password has been generated, please click the password field or button above to copy. Please login and change your password as soon as possible!

about.title: About
about.description: One API is an open-source API management and proxy platform.

success.verification_code: Verification code sent, please check your email!
success.password_reset: Reset email sent, please check your inbox!

error.login_expired: Not logged in or session expired, please login again!
error.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters!
error.turnstile_wait: Please wait a few seconds, Turnstile is checking the environment!
error.root_password: Please change the default password immediately!
